modName: Fit for a Listener - Dawnstar Sanctuary Overhaul
summary: A smallish mod to restore a sense of power to the lair of the Dark Brotherhood.
descriptionHtml:
This is an overhaul of the Dawnstar Sanctuary with one specific goal: To make it fit for a listener. I felt that the vanilla Sanctuary was a bit too dank and dirty for my taste. The greatest assassins in all of Tamriel should lurk in the shadows, not in the cobwebs. I created this mod to make the Sanctuary resemble the former glory that the Brotherhood boasted in it\'s hay-day. Making it more symmetrical, regal, uniform, and intimidating, while still maintaining the rough-and-tumble Skyrim feel. Below are a list of features:

-Blacksmithing necessities
-Enchanting table
-New, whole banners
-Redesigned dining room
-Lighting re-balances
-Reopened crypts
-Redesigned bedroom
-Room for more recruits
-Swept-up cobwebs

These are all in addition to general changes to make the sanctuary feel more imposing and impressive.


*Notes*
I STRONGLY recommend installing this AFTER acquiring the sanctuary and possibly after receiving all upgrades, as I have not tested how these scenarios work with the mod.
I expect there to be a few bugs along the way, and I\'ll keep as up-to-date on fixes as I can.

A word to the wise: Some doors are best left locked, lest you find yourself on the wrong side of maternal instincts.
author: Spudguy314

files.name: Fit for a Listener v1_1
files.changelogHtml:
Fixed space near the back of the ice cavern that opened up into the unfinished cell.
Added blacksmithing! Full blacksmithing set up, including forge, workbench, tanning rack, and grindstone.
Added enchanting table in master bedroom.
